name: test_e2e_with_logs[674_CRLF_SESSION_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_SESSION_002` |
| **Name** | Session Fixation via PHPSESSID CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | session_fixation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nSet-Cookie:PHPSESSID=evil_session;Path=/`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aSet-Cookie%3APHPSESSID%3Devil_session%3BPath%3D%2F`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~3000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:07:21.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
